00043 IntervalScanner::IntervalScanner(Comm *comm,
00044     const TableIdentifier *table_identifier, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00045     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr, const ScanSpec &scan_spec,
00046     uint32_t timeout_ms)
00047   : m_comm(comm), m_schema_ptr(schema_ptr),
00048     m_range_locator_ptr(range_locator_ptr), m_range_server(comm, timeout_ms),
00049     m_table_identifier(*table_identifier), m_started(false),
00050     m_eos(false), m_readahead(true), m_fetch_outstanding(false),
00051     m_end_inclusive(false), m_rows_seen(0), m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms) {
00052   const char *start_row, *end_row;
00053 
00054   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty() && !scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty())
00055     HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00056              "ROW predicates and CELL predicates can't be combined");
00057 
00058   HT_ASSERT(m_timeout_ms);
00059 
00060   m_range_locator_ptr->get_location_cache(m_cache_ptr);
00061   m_range_server.set_default_timeout(m_timeout_ms);
00062 
00063   m_scan_spec_builder.set_row_limit(scan_spec.row_limit);
00064   m_scan_spec_builder.set_max_versions(scan_spec.max_versions);
00065 
00066   for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.columns.size(); i++) {
00067     if (m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(scan_spec.columns[i]) == 0)
00068       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY, scan_spec.columns[i]);
00069     m_scan_spec_builder.add_column(scan_spec.columns[i]);
00070   }
00071 
00072   HT_ASSERT(scan_spec.row_intervals.size() <= 1);
00073 
00074   if (!scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00075     start_row = (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start == 0) ? ""
00076         : scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start;
00077     end_row = (scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end == 0) ? Key::END_ROW_MARKER
00078         : scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end;
00079     int cmpval = strcmp(start_row, end_row);
00080     if (cmpval > 0)
00081       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00082     if (cmpval == 0 && !scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start_inclusive
00083         && !scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00084       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "empty row interval");
00085     m_start_row = start_row;
00086     m_end_row = end_row;
00087     m_end_inclusive = scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive;
00088     m_scan_spec_builder.add_row_interval(start_row,
00089         scan_spec.row_intervals[0].start_inclusive, end_row,
00090         scan_spec.row_intervals[0].end_inclusive);
00091   }
00092   else if (!scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00093     start_row = (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row == 0) ? ""
00094         : scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00095     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column == 0)
00096       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00097                "Bad cell interval (start_column == NULL)");
00098     end_row = (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row == 0) ? Key::END_ROW_MARKER
00099         : scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00100     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column == 0)
00101       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC,
00102                "Bad cell interval (end_column == NULL)");
00103     int cmpval = strcmp(start_row, end_row);
00104     if (cmpval > 0)
00105       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "start_row > end_row");
00106     if (cmpval == 0) {
00107       int cmpval = strcmp(scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column,
00108                           scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column);
00109       if (cmpval == 0 && !scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive
00110           && !scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive)
00111         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "empty cell interval");
00112     }
00113     m_scan_spec_builder.add_cell_interval(start_row,
00114         scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_column,
00115         scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_inclusive,
00116         end_row, scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_column,
00117         scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_inclusive);
00118     m_start_row = scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].start_row;
00119     m_end_row = scan_spec.cell_intervals[0].end_row;
00120     m_end_inclusive = true;
00121   }
00122   else {
00123     m_start_row = "";
00124     m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00125     m_scan_spec_builder.add_row_interval("", false, Key::END_ROW_MARKER, false);
00126   }
00127 
00128   if (m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit == 1
00129       || m_start_row.compare(m_end_row) == 0)
00130     m_readahead = false;
00131 
00132   m_scan_spec_builder.set_time_interval(scan_spec.time_interval.first,
00133                                         scan_spec.time_interval.second);
00134 
00135   m_scan_spec_builder.set_return_deletes(scan_spec.return_deletes);
00136 }

00142 IntervalScanner::~IntervalScanner() {
00143 
00144   // if there is an outstanding fetch, wait for it to come back or timeout
00145   if (m_fetch_outstanding)
00146     m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event_ptr);
00147 }

00150 
00151 bool IntervalScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00152   int error;
00153   SerializedKey serkey;
00154   ByteString value;
00155   Key key;
00156   Timer timer(m_timeout_ms);
00157 
00158   if (m_eos)
00159     return false;
00160 
00161   if (!m_started)
00162     find_range_and_start_scan(m_start_row.c_str(), timer);
00163 
00164   while (!m_scanblock.more()) {
00165     if (m_scanblock.eos()) {
00166       if (!strcmp(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(), Key::END_ROW_MARKER) ||
00167           m_end_row.compare(m_range_info.end_row) <= 0) {
00168         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00169                                        m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00170         m_eos = true;
00171         return false;
00172       }
00173       String next_row = m_range_info.end_row;
00174       next_row.append(1,1);  // construct row key in next range
00175       find_range_and_start_scan(next_row.c_str(), timer);
00176     }
00177     else {
00178       if (m_fetch_outstanding) {
00179         if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(m_event_ptr)) {
00180           m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00181           HT_ERRORF("RangeServer 'fetch scanblock' error : %s",
00182                     Protocol::string_format_message(m_event_ptr).c_str());
00183           HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(m_event_ptr), "");
00184         }
00185         else {
00186           error = m_scanblock.load(m_event_ptr);
00187           if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00188             m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr,
00189                 m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), &m_sync_handler);
00190             m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00191           }
00192           else
00193             m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00194         }
00195       }
00196       else {
00197         timer.start();
00198         m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00199         m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr,
00200             m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), m_scanblock);
00201       }
00202 
00203     }
00204   }
00205 
00206   if (m_scanblock.next(serkey, value)) {
00207     Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00208     if (!key.load(serkey))
00209       HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "");
00210 
00211     // check for end row
00212 
00213     if (!strcmp(key.row, Key::END_ROW_MARKER)) {
00214       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00215                                      m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00216       m_eos = true;
00217       return false;
00218     }
00219 
00220     if (m_end_inclusive) {
00221       if (strcmp(key.row, m_end_row.c_str()) > 0) {
00222         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00223                                        m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00224         m_eos = true;
00225         return false;
00226       }
00227     }
00228     else {
00229       if (strcmp(key.row, m_end_row.c_str()) >= 0) {
00230         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00231                                        m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00232         m_eos = true;
00233         return false;
00234       }
00235     }
00236 
00237     // check for row change and row limit
00238     if (strcmp(m_cur_row.c_str(), key.row)) {
00239       m_rows_seen++;
00240       m_cur_row = key.row;
00241       if (m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit > 0
00242           && m_rows_seen > m_scan_spec_builder.get().row_limit) {
00243         m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr,
00244                                        m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00245         m_eos = true;
00246         return false;
00247       }
00248     }
00249 
00250     cell.row_key = key.row;
00251     cell.column_qualifier = key.column_qualifier;
00252     if ((cf = m_schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code)) == 0) {
00253       // LOG ERROR ...
00254       //HT_THROW(Error::BAD_KEY, "");
00255       cell.column_family = 0;
00256     }
00257     else
00258       cell.column_family = cf->name.c_str();
00259 
00260     cell.timestamp = key.timestamp;
00261     cell.value_len = value.decode_length(&cell.value);
00262     cell.flag = key.flag;
00263     return true;
00264   }
00265 
00266   HT_ERROR("No end marker found at end of table.");
00267 
00268   m_range_server.destroy_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00269   m_eos = true;
00270   return false;
00271 }

00275 void
00276 IntervalScanner::find_range_and_start_scan(const char *row_key, Timer &timer) {
00277   RangeSpec  range;
00278   DynamicBuffer dbuf(0);
00279 
00280   timer.start();
00281 
00282  try_again:
00283 
00284   try {
00285     if (!m_cache_ptr->lookup(m_table_identifier.id, row_key, &m_range_info))
00286       m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key,
00287                                      &m_range_info, timer, false);
00288   }
00289   catch (Exception &e) {
00290     if (e.code() == Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT)
00291       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00292     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00293     if (timer.expired())
00294       HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "");
00295     goto try_again;
00296   }
00297 
00298   m_started = true;
00299 
00300   while (true) {
00301     dbuf.ensure(m_range_info.start_row.length()
00302                 + m_range_info.end_row.length() + 2);
00303     range.start_row = (char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.start_row.c_str(),
00304         m_range_info.start_row.length()+1);
00305     range.end_row   = (char *)dbuf.add_unchecked(m_range_info.end_row.c_str(),
00306         m_range_info.end_row.length()+1);
00307     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(m_range_info.location.c_str(),
00308         m_cur_addr)) {
00309       HT_ERRORF("Invalid location found in METADATA entry range [%s..%s] - %s",
00310                 range.start_row, range.end_row, m_range_info.location.c_str());
00311       HT_THROW(Error::INVALID_METADATA, "");
00312     }
00313 
00314     try {
00315       m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00316       m_range_server.create_scanner(m_cur_addr, m_table_identifier, range,
00317                                     m_scan_spec_builder.get(), m_scanblock);
00318     }
00319     catch (Exception &e) {
00320 
00321       if ((e.code() != Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT
00322            && e.code() != Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00323           || timer.remaining() <= 3.0) {
00324         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00325         HT_THROW(e.code(), String("Problem creating scanner on ")
00326                  + m_table_identifier.name + "[" + range.start_row + ".."
00327                  + range.end_row + "]");
00328       }
00329 
00330       // wait a few seconds
00331       poll(0, 0, 3000);
00332 
00333       // try again, the hard way
00334       m_range_locator_ptr->find_loop(&m_table_identifier, row_key,
00335                                      &m_range_info, timer, true);
00336       continue;
00337     }
00338     break;
00339   }
00340 
00341   // maybe kick off readahead
00342   if (m_readahead && !m_scanblock.eos()) {
00343     m_range_server.fetch_scanblock(m_cur_addr, m_scanblock.get_scanner_id(),
00344                                    &m_sync_handler);
00345     m_fetch_outstanding = true;
00346   }
00347   else
00348     m_fetch_outstanding = false;
00349 }
